aka: The Nightingale and the Night. Chavela Vargas sings to Lorca

cast.name: 查维拉·巴尔加斯 Chavela Vargas

region: 西班牙/墨西哥/哥伦比亚 Colombia
this_title: El ruiseñor y la noche. Chavela Vargas canta a Lorca
trans_title: 夜莺与夜：查维拉·巴尔加斯吟唱洛尔卡
The Nightingale and the Night. Chavela Vargas sings to Lorca
introduction: Chavela Vargas and Federico Garcia Lorca are the main characters of this story . Poetry and music are the places of their meetings . Chavela explains that when she lived in the same room where Lorca studied decades ago, she was visited by a bird that contained the soul of the Spanish poet. In her last year of life, Chavela fulfills her last wish: to make a tribute to Federico and finally meet him in the ranks of death. The Nightingale and the Night, is a documentary that chronicles the transition from life to death of Chavela, her union with Lorca, dissolving the borders between reality and dreams.
chinese_title: 夜莺与夜：查维拉·巴尔加斯吟唱洛尔卡
foreign_title: El ruiseñor y la noche. Chavela Vargas canta a Lorca
